text:
# Abilify: A Comprehensive Review

of its Mechanism and Side Effects

As of August 05, 2024, Abilify (aripiprazole) remains a widely prescribed

antipsychotic medication for the treatment of schizophrenia, bipolar disorder,

and irritability associated with autism. Developed by Otsuka Pharmaceutical

Co., Ltd. (www.otsuka.co.jp), in collaboration with Eli Lilly and Company

(www.lilly.com), Abilify has been approved for use in over 100 countries

worldwide.
